name: Lira Windvale
personality: Kind-hearted and cautious, always puts others first.
quirks: Hums lullabies when healing; allergic to cats.
trait: Wears a silver locket with a photo of her sister.

name: Thorn Blackroot
personality: Sarcastic and pragmatic, but fiercely loyal once trust is earned.
quirks: Never enters a room through the door; obsessed with shiny objects.
voice: Low and gruff, with a hint of mischief
trait: Keeps a journal with coded entries no one can crack.

name: Elda Farwatch
personality: Inquisitive and timid, full of curiosity and fear in equal parts.
quirks: Speaks too fast when excited; wears mismatched socks.
trait: Has a floating spellbook that follows her like a puppy.

name: Durgan Stoneheart
personality: Brave but reckless; charges first, thinks later.
quirks: Talks to his axe like it's a person; hates stairs.
trait: Beard is braided into the shape of a hammer.

name: Mira Velen
personality: Flirtatious, dramatic, and always seeking attention.
quirks: Rhymes when nervous; carries perfume for every mood.
trait: Her lute can shoot sparks when she strums hard.

name: Kel Emberwatch
personality: Quiet, calculating, prefers animals over people.
quirks: Sleeps with one eye open; names all their arrows.
trait: Always accompanied by a hawk named Whisper.

name: Tavi Moonsoul
personality: Strict and devout, unwavering in moral code.
quirks: Quotes scripture constantly; fastidious about cleanliness.
trait: Eyes glow faintly in the dark.

name: Rook Ashbrand
personality: Mysterious and brooding, hides a troubled past.
quirks: Talks to shadows; refuses to remove gloves.

name: Nyra Dawnsworn
personality: Noble and idealistic, always defends the weak.
quirks: Keeps a diary titled 'Knightly Thoughts'; salutes before battle.

name: Zekk Tinkbolt
personality: Chaotic, curious, always building something bizarre.
quirks: Invents at least one new gadget per day (half explode).
trait: Wears goggles with four lenses that constantly flip.
